Transform a cardboard box into a fort or playhouse for children to use for imaginative play.
Cut out a door and a few windows to create a miniature house or store for a doll or action figure.
Use the box to make a DIY birdhouse by painting it and adding a perch and some ventilation holes.
Fold the box into an origami sculpture or use it as a base for a 3D art project.
Use the box as a storage container for small items, and decorate it with paint or stickers to make it more visually appealing.
